metadata.title: CVE-2018-14363 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in NeoMutt before 2018-07-16. newsrc.c does not properly restrict '/' characters that may have unsafe interaction with cache pathnames.

criterions.comment: neomutt package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20180716+dfsg.1-1.2').
